official_title: Authorizing the World Summit for Children Candlelight Vigils to sponsor a public event on the United States Capitol grounds.

summary.text: Authorizes the World Summit for Children Candlelight Vigils to sponsor a free public event with music on the United States Capitol grounds on September 23, 1990.
